r.s: Port of the RAP NTriple serializer
r.d: This package is a port of the NTriple serializer of the RDF API for PHP (aka RAP): http://www.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/suhl/bizer/rdfapi/.
r.n: - propagate PEAR errors to the user - cosmetic fixes QA release Bug #17788 Avoid ereg Package 2.0 Dir structure in SVN
